professional_summary: Experienced Oracle DBA with expertise in Oracle 10g, SQL Server, RMAN, ASM, and Oracle Grid Control. Proven track record across multiple financial institutions with responsibilities including installation, configuration, and administration of Oracle RAC environments, data warehousing, schema replication using Streams, and monitoring database performance.

key_responsibilities: Installed and configured Oracle 10g RAC on Sun Solaris 10 in multiple environments (SIT
DIT
UAT
BDI
BSI
LT
PROD
PROD2) following Bank of America standards.
Administered ASM on RAC instances and applied CPU patches
Opatch
CRS patches
and interim patches.
Converted single-node Oracle 10g databases to two-node RAC using rconfig and resolved post-conversion errors.
Configured Oracle 10g Grid Control for SQL Server performance monitoring.
Assisted Spectrum and PLS development teams with database administration tasks.
Performed regular backups and recovery using export and import dumps.
Configured Oracle 10g Grid Control and monitored database performance using AWR
ADDM
tkprof
and alert logs.
Planned and implemented schema-level Streams for data replication across multiple environments.
Resolved errors encountered during rconfig conversions.
Installed and configured Oracle 10g RAC on Red Hat Linux.
Administered ASM on RAC instances and applied patch sets including Jan CPU10 and Oct CPU09.
Developed monitoring and maintenance scripts for replicated cluster databases using Oracle Grid Control.
Configured Oracle 10g with RMAN for backup and recovery solutions.
Administered multiple databases across various environments using PL/SQL and SQL Server.
Performed database optimization tasks to improve query performance.
Configured and administered Oracle 10g databases in high-traffic environments.
Assisted application development teams with database schema design and optimization.
Performed regular maintenance tasks including user management
grant permissions
and backup strategies.
